fixed_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to all foes equal to 61.8/64.2/66.6% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 18% for foes with an elemental ailment.
fixed_skill.name: Mafreila

innate_skill.desc: 43.1/45.3/47.4% chance to inflict Enrage on 1 foe for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Taunt

innate_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to 1 foe equal to 81.4/85.5/89.5% of Attack, ignoring their Defense.
innate_skill.name: Voidal Vortex

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 14%. Increase Nuclear damage dealt to foes below 50% HP by 46%.
passive_skill.name: Diligent Record

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 14%. Increase Nuclear damage dealt to foes below 50% HP by 52%.
passive_skill.name: Diligent Record I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 14%. Increase Nuclear damage dealt to foes below 50% HP by 58%.
passive_skill.name: Diligent Record II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
